sik.client.user.services
Class RMIClient

java.lang.Object
  sik.client.user.services.RMIClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class RMIClient
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

Class to act as an RMI Client which uses an RMI Server Interface to connect to a remote RMI server implementation and gain the ability to call remote methods as the the using data will be stored on a remote server

Author:
Jamie Brindle (06352322) - Manchester Metropolitan University
See Also:
Serialized Form

Field Summary
private  java.lang.String bindName
          the bindName URL to where the RMI server code base in located
private  ClientIOServices clientOptions
          Class to perform text file IO operations, in which the text file contains attribute values and settings to be used by this and other classes
private  java.lang.String operationMessage
          String used by a parent class to determine whether or not a student ID exists in the RMI server's student records store
 sik.common.RMIServer rmiServer
          This remote server interface object
private static long serialVersionUID
          Default universal serializable class ID
 sik.common.StudentRecord studentRecord
          Student record object, which contains details of the students using the user client
